Negative_Review: The air conditioning was a bit noisy
Positive_Review: The Hotel was convenient very clean the food was excellent the staff were friendly helpful and very polite You really great you can t knock it

Negative_Review: The room was extremely small and the television didn t work from the bed you had to get up to change channels or to turn the volume up and down
Positive_Review: The staff were lovely but after booking I messaged the hotel through their Facebook page explaining that it was my husbands 40th birthday surprise weekend and could they arrange to have a bottle of champagne waiting for us in our room I can see that they had read the message so didn t think to double check but unfortunately they hadn t arranged this and for the cost of the room it was extremely pokey with stains on the ceiling and urine stains all under the toilet in the tiles

Negative_Review: There was nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: We were delighted in particular by the high calibre of the staff They were always extremely polite friendly helpful and highly efficient They were always anxious to do their best for the hotel s guests The hotel management clearly takes customer care very seriously indeed The Chesterfield Mayfair provided superb service and an excellent experience We found that the hotel was outstanding in every key department The hotel far exceeded our expectations

Negative_Review: The staff at breakfast restaurant can be dis organized at times forgot to bring our order or the wrong order But the staff at lobby were very efficient and everyone was very friendly
Positive_Review: It is a beautiful hotel Both the lobby and the room are updated and gorgeous The interior walls are furnished with a thick sound absorbing material It makes the room very quiet Bed is comfortable The breakfast was one of the best Pretty convenient location It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the nearby tube station

We just love the atmosphere of this small stylish first class hotel right in the heart of distinguished Mayfair The staff is very friendly and helpful you do feel at home the very first moment you enter the lobby We have been coming to the Chesterfield for many years and we have never been disappointed
The superb English breakfast classics but also with a modern twist namely quashed avocado with poached hen s egg on toast The staff are incredibly friendly

We were at Hyde Park for a concert so the last thing we were thinking about was the hotel but it was just perfect Easy taxi ride from Paddington great location in Mayfair bar with choice of gins was exceptional bed was huge and breakfast really good In fact breakfast was so good and filling we missed lunch All staff were really friendly and helpful

Superb customer service friendly staff and amazing location I managed to turn off fully for one night and could do with living there for rest of my days Breakfast of champions too Colourful rooms a nice touch

Very attentive staff helped me buy tickets for attractions and arrange travel Perks for kids child size robes slippers and kid toiletries with advance notice prior to booking Super comfortable quiet and English atmosphere this unique hotel with paintings of nobles and dogs and a tartan color scheme could only exist in England

Negative_Review: Shower over tub forgot to make up room in a timely matter one of three days AC could be better but not too bad
Positive_Review: Intimate feeling friendly helpful staff excellent breakfast

We had a wonderful stay We loved the bar area and relaxed there in the evenings after a long day It was wonderful The rooms were comfortable The staff was excellent and very responsive I do not have a single complaint

Negative_Review: Almost impossible to note anything I didn t like as there was nothing I did not like about this hotel Perhaps if pushed I would could comment that the piano was a tad too loud in the Terrace Lounge Bar it tended to distract and make conversation a little difficult but that is being pushed to say something I personally could say I didn t appreciate
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for me the hotel staff were polite well informed courteous friendly and simply just down right as good as it can be The room was to my tastes clean with a good work space comfortable chairs with excellent WiFi the bathroom was clean bright with all the attributes and facilities one wishes to have a trifle on the small size but I wasn t intending to have a a dinner party in the room so ideal The hotel just oozed quiet quality quintessential English from the moment the taxi door was opened by the doorman the rest just flowed like a dream

Negative_Review: Some of the rooms are crowded if bigger ones are better Everything is well
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic Very comfortable the room is British style like it

Negative_Review: Breakfast food was only adequate Rubbery eggs hard waffles Brick wall was window view
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff Cleanliness Room itself was excellent Location was top notch Lots of eating places nearby

Negative_Review: Hard to find anything to dislike Suggested they add some cheeses an broaden the variety of breads on breakfast buffet But there are so many other choices this is a minor personal request
Positive_Review: Ideal location wonderful staff and well maintained luxury facility Had a minor medical issue and they arranged a doctors appointment immediately Even received a farewell cupcake the night before departure

Negative_Review: at check in time they asked me which newspaper I would like to have everyday morning but actually I didn t receive it but only once when I reminded them
Positive_Review: homey atmosphere

Negative_Review: Not a cheap hotel but very nice and comfortable Temporary construction work on 5th floor was very noisy 10AM 5PM Compared to all other days was Sunday breakfast service not good Probably a one time exception since it worked great all other days
Positive_Review: A luxury hotel close to Hyde Park and Green Park which both are nice for strolling About 10 min walk to Green Park underground and around an hour with Piccadilly line to Heathrow Simple and comfortable
The hotel was in an awesome location and the staff was incredible The afternoon tea was amazing and we LOVED the free cell phone accommodation to help with getting around London

Lovely hotel very friendly staff and a perfect location for sightseeing in London It was a lovely surprise to receive a London Marathon goody bag when we checked in and so nice to be able to walk back from the marathon finish line
Very welcoming fantastic location very close to Bond Street Walton Street etc Comfortable room and it has Sky which was very handy for the F1 race
Loverly hotel with traditional English style very quiet and comfort easy to get into other place of downtown nice staff provide professional service

Negative_Review: I guess the hotel caters for North American visitors mostly as it was a bit Old Fashioned They like that kind of thing with regard to d cor Fully functional and clean but lots of dark wood panels etc which dates it although I suspect they have gone to great lengths to recreate this look
Positive_Review: The location

Negative_Review: Couldnt operate the television using the remote had to use controls on side of television
Positive_Review: The bed and bed linen were so comfortable Loved coming back after the theatre to find a card and box of macaroons lovely touch

The hotel is in a quiet area and at the same time at a walking distance from restaurants bars and shopping areas You can enjoy good food at the hotel s restaurant The staff is very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: The first room I was given was simply unacceptable for this price point It was dark tired and the mattress was on its last legs Also Mayfair is a stuffy and dull neighborhood You will find yourself spending your time in other more fun parts of London
Positive_Review: No Positive

It was just a cute hotel and just what we needed being on our honeymoon The staffs really friendly and helpful They left us little gifts throughout the week We did stay in a suite and it was perfect The location of this hotel for the price is really good We have been to london a couple times before and really liked this hotel and location The room was always clean not stuffy everything worked great and the room itself like the hotel had its own charm
Excellent professional staff for whom nothing was too much trouble We have stayed here before and chose this for our 40th wedding anniversary and were not disappointed Food and service top class

Negative_Review: Single room too small I did fall over the corner of the bed when unpacking suitcase no room to move landed squash up by wall should have said something but felt a bit of a fool falling so would not be to stay there again
Positive_Review: Location and staff very good pianist was very good in the evening lovely atmosphere

Negative_Review: The cooked breakfast was a little disappointing as poached eggs arrived with a lot of water on the plate plus the tomato was very undercooked it was almost raw and overall not very hot I asked for one egg got two also asked for two bits of toast got a rack Do not like wasting food The staff should be more attentive when taking an order
Positive_Review: Lovely staff in general

Negative_Review: Having to lesve There s nothing not to like
Positive_Review: Friendly staff personal touches hubby s Birthday a card cake sent Always happy to help We just keep returning
Have stayed here in London for the last seven years It is very convenient to all locations Butlers is excellent and the rooms are fine Great place to stay in London

Negative_Review: The single room I have stayed in was extremely tiny Never seen such size before I think for 4 start hotel it is way to small I could not even open my medium size samsonite case
Positive_Review: I was amazed by handy smartphone they provide in every room Extremely helpful for tourist having always connection

Everything was PERFECT Such an amazing experience and everything was on the highest level Big greetings to Charlie at the desk she was so helpful and friendly Definitely a place to remember close to everything and with true spirit of english traditions Been to London for more that 7 times and in different hotels this one the best

Negative_Review: Interiors specially of the rooms could be updated as well as providing mini refrigerators as standard
Positive_Review: Location polite and friendly services of the staffs

Negative_Review: had to pay 50 upfront to cover any purchases during stay No mention of this anywhere on the website or on the booking page
Positive_Review: room was compact but very comfortable lovely decor very clean very comfy bed surprisingly quiet

Staff were very friendly and helpful it was a bitterly cold day when we arrived draft from window asked if something could be done problem sorted immediately Breakfast one of the best we have had in London hotels

Negative_Review: When our room was serviced at night the tea and milk weren t replaced Also the towels were not folded up and the bath mat needed replacing but wasn t
Positive_Review: Excellent food

Attentive and very friendly staff nothing was too much trouble Fabulous location for the Shepherds Market area very easy walking distance to Buckingham Place St James Palace and New Bond Oxford streets I have been coming here for the last 26 years and have built up a good rapport with a number of the Staff and in particular Darren John and Chris Very sadly Chris is no longer with us but will be missed very much by his family colleagues and guests alike you made the place special Chris rest in peace my friend
The superb location in Mayfair incredibly pleasant and helpful staff enormous breakfasts cozy bar and overall ambience can not be beat Marvelous little hotel full of charm and atmosphere

The location and service was excellent Especially the staff at the lobby was exceptional The only issue I felt at the hotel was the washrooms probably lacked proper heating and were very cold The rest was all perfect
Courteous staff loved our comfy room the receptionist who went the extra mile fab breakfast complimentary newspaper excellent location and the lovely doorman

Negative_Review: Our room was quite small dreadful view form the window overlooked the aircon units and the bath was awkward to get in and out of for us oldies Would request a walk in shower next time
Positive_Review: Overall it was excellent
We opted in for the breakfast at additional cost Was happily surprised to learn that they would deliver it to our room gratis The Staff was smart and helpful

Negative_Review: Area around the bath looked a little tired and worn there was a mark in the bath but I don t think you could do anything about that without replacing the whole bath and redoing the bathroom
Positive_Review: From the moment our taxi drew up at the front of the hotel we knew that we would enjoy our stay here The Doorman was there instantly to open the taxi doors and extend a warm welcome to us The hotel is fabulous and the staff really do pay attention to every detail As it was my boyfriend s birthday there was a cake and a personalised birthday card waiting for him in our room a lovely touch The bed was really comfortable with sumptuous bedding you could really snuggle into Even the slippers provided had more padded soles that you would normally get The bar area is cosy and the cocktails and service superb great piano playing too Really great location and really quiet at night In the hotel info they tell you some of the history about who used to live in the different houses which now make up the hotel a very enjoyable read Would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Very very minor negative comment bathroom was a little cramped and a bit difficult to get into bath and shower bath control confused each other This did not detract from lovely stay
Positive_Review: Everything the location comfort of public areas and bedroom staff friendliness and attitude

Negative_Review: Not didn t like but the breakfast while it was very good and a great selection was a little pricey
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and nothing was too much trouble The bed struggled to get out it was so comfortable The hotel is in a perfect location for shopping and many attractions Will definitely check here first next time I need to stay in London

Negative_Review: The standard room was small bathroom was refurbished without soul and incredibly tiny TV impossible to work no cnn No minibar Shame on a hotel with such great potential Stuffy and I like stuffy hotels see portobello hotel and beverly hills hotel for inspiration
Positive_Review: Nice location and lobby a bit of a faded beauty though
The location of the hotel is within walking distance to the shopping area and to the subway And the staffs were most helpful too It s been a wonderful 4 days stay with them

Negative_Review: Bathroom was quite small compared to other hotels we have stayed in
Positive_Review: Excellent service all staff very helpful Breakfast was good as were the cocktails in the bar

My husband and I booked this as a Christmas present for each other and we had a lot of trouble booking and ended up being asked to provide the card details we were going to use to book by email which was very scary and we ended up wanting to cancel The team at the hotel turned it all around and reassured us it would be ok they included a complimentary breakfast and upgraded our room which really helped change our opinion We will definitely be recommending the hotel to our family and friends and we will be returning Thanks for making it such a lovely Christmas present

Negative_Review: I didn t like we had to leave
Positive_Review: Service was wonderful The staff were there 24 7 when we needed them Wrote welcome cards rang our room checking everything ok drew our curtains at night adding mince pies and water next to our bed Amazing

Negative_Review: Guest service requests can be hit and miss
Positive_Review: Size of the classic room pleasant surprise especially for London Cosy feel of the hotel Beautiful view on the roofs of the neighbouring buildings

This was my second stay at XMAS time and it exceeded my expectations Room was comfortable large and despite my bad back the bed was quite comfortable Staff without exception was outstanding helpful friendly and attentive Location is perfect Definitely will return to Chesterfield Mayfair

Wonderful hotel in the old Classic Brittish way LOTs of breakfastchoice comfortable room equiped with ALLYou need and more like heat in the mirror and bathroomfloor and light inside the wardrobe This is the best stay in London
Very friendly and helpful staff Great location near sites and public transport Beautiful old English hotel Comfortable accommodations

Lovely room decorated in a quintessentially English style The hotel is unique with different decor in each room or suite Great English breakfast to fuel a full day of site seeing Helpful staff great housekeeping Loved the added touch of cookies in the room with the tea and coffee

Negative_Review: Spent one very noisy evening in our room due to jet lag because the hotel was booked a party It sounded like the DJ was in our room No notice nor apology from the hotel staff
Positive_Review: The extremely friendly staff

Where to start this was the most amazing romantic get away ever The room was incredibly beautiful the bathtbu left me speachless The staff was friendly and helupful it was my boyfriends birthday and they really made it special

Negative_Review: A little pricey but got what we paid for
Positive_Review: This hotel is outstanding in every capacity particularly the staff were extremely helpful and personable Nothing was too much trouble the location was great for us and I will definitely be coming back and recommending this to others

absolutely everything about this wonderful hotel with a fabulous team of lovely staff nothing is too much trouble its just the best hotel we have ever stayed at in London prefer the chesterfield to even the ritz thank you all for the 9th year wonderful weekend stay at the chesterfield x 3

Negative_Review: The only negative was that we ordered breakfast in the room and the order wasn t picked up by the night staff so had to ring down to reception in the morning It then arrived an hour later than we requested and it was cold
Positive_Review: The room was lovely with everything you need The bed was very comfy and the bed linen was amazing Great bar and pianist and in a great location Lovely hotel

Negative_Review: Recommendations when sought were somewhat lacking i e dining
Positive_Review: The location to top sites is wonderful very accessible Staff was eager to help and very friendly Access to the underground was very convenient

Negative_Review: The elevators are super busy during morning and night so you usually have to use the stairs
Positive_Review: Breakfast was brilliant and it feels like you are in an old English cottage The rooms are nice and has all you need

Negative_Review: I found the beds quite uncomfortable and the bathrooms were very cramped and awkward I wouldn t recommend staying in this hotel if you had any physical mobility issues
Positive_Review: Great location Nearby restaurants and bars were nice

Negative_Review: the lift elevator is a disaster it is simply too small and stuffy I found the hotel to be quite shabby the rooms are cramped and generally it was not to my liking
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful
The staff were very helpful We asked the concierge lots of questions and he was always helpful The bar staff were lovely The doorman was always helpful in helping us get a cab and very polite

Great location and courteous attentive staff The hotel is lovely and well maintained Because it is an older property the rooms tend to be smaller but they are well appointed and in great condition I would stay there again without hesitation

Negative_Review: We didn t experience any negatives
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent and very attentive Jason at the concierge desk was extremely helpful and Jade in the bar always made everyone feel welcome with her great attitude

Negative_Review: Nothing I just wish I could stay longer
Positive_Review: This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed Besides the normal cons of a good hotel such as location service etc this hotel stands out as it pays attention to details and really think from a guest perspective to make your stay comfortable each room has its own decoration with good taste and they offer turn down service which is not quite usual for a 4 star hotel and they offer you the facial mist which is quite handy in Europe as it is usually quite dry at night And do include breakfast if you can choose this package Full English breakfast is amazing They offer hot dish like egg benedict freshly cooked from the kitchen plus small buffet for bread and cheese cereals etc The last hotel impressed me in a similar way is Penisula Highly recommend everyone who stay at London downtown to try this hotel

Negative_Review: Rooms are a bit small but that s to be expected in an older place in London There was a mishap somewhere so the elevator and hallway smelled awful for a few days
Positive_Review: The Gin tasting at the bar was really interesting highly recommend it Staff was great

Negative_Review: the hotel is a bit old style and sometimes dusty in places
Positive_Review: very nice staff the room was clean everytime i got out with small nice presents on my bed

Negative_Review: The value or lack thereof of the breakfast and quality of food served at the continental buffet Was very happy that we didn t buy the breakfast package
Positive_Review: The staff and the size amenities of the room outstanding

Negative_Review: Decor is a little tired in spots though that gives it a certain British charm
Positive_Review: The people were wonderful Everyone we encountered was super nice and helpful

Negative_Review: Didn t get King bed we booked and the reception told us we had when checking in but too much trouble to complain or change Room so small barely had places for our luggage
Positive_Review: Service excellent and fast and some nice amenities in the room Food decent

Negative_Review: Bathroom I prefer a shower head that is detachable
Positive_Review: Excellent location 2 mins walk from Green Park Tube and a 5 minute walk to Bond Street shops Lovely Afternoon Tea and delicious freshly cooked breakfast Wonderful piano player in the cocktail bar and very tranquil and unrushed atmosphere Very comfortable bed and Aircon TV IT facilities in bedroom Good wifi included Exceptionally polite and friendly staff from arriving to departure

The air conditioning the bed the water pressure in the shower all of the important stuff Also the location the value the staff the overall condition of the property in a nutshell this the best hotel I ve ever stayed in while in London
Upon arrival late morning staff were friendly and welcoming and our room was ready Room was impeccable bed was large and comfortable Will return

Negative_Review: Rooms are small Hotel food is expensive We stay here at least once a year but are never recognized as frequent guests
Positive_Review: Very convenient for area of London we wanted Very accommodating staff Good value

Negative_Review: The decor of the corridor and room was not to our taste and appeared a little tired It was probably right up to date at one time but unfortunately it wasn t timeless like the foyer The bathroom was compact to say the least probably the smallest en suite hotel bathroom I ve come across and although I never thought it would be possible the shower is too powerful so you have to modulate the flow with the taps The hot water is far too hot but thankfully they have mixer taps on the basin also The bathroom decor was looking a bit tired like the room There was a wedding on the night we stayed and the music could be heard in our room on the 2nd floor This could obviously be an issue for some people The door staff weren t very observant and seemed obsolete but maybe they are just there for the posher looking guests As a treat for my wife s birthday I was hoping for something a little more special than a Premier Inn which is our usual choice but unfortunately the Chesterfield didn t live up to expectations or the price tag then again it was Mayfair location location etc Perhaps the hotel s other facilities bring the standard up
Positive_Review: The foyer of the Chesterfield was luxuriously decorated as you would expect and looking through towards the bar and lounge areas everything looked well thought out and appeared impressive irrespective of the age The bed was comfortable and everything was very clean The towels were thick which is always a nice touch The receptionist was friendly and efficient and the cleaning staff seemed friendly also The location of the Chesterfield is superb being a short walk from Green Park tube which itself is very well linked to the areas we wanted to travel to

Negative_Review: Asides from having to leave on our last day I would like to mention maybe leaving more toilet roll in a cupboard rather than one in the bathroom My partner had an upset stomach and I had to go and but more due to there not being more available
Positive_Review: Upon arriving we were greeted by lovely friendly professional staff We were able to book in for an afternoon tea which we enjoyed immensely The room itself was beautiful and extremely comfortable The staff had no problems giving us directions or recommendations and all were knowledgeable about the area Breakfast was delivered to our room and was delicious Every single thing about our stay was perfect Thank you
It was my hubbys birthday and we were offered free drinks in the bar and a birthday cake all because I said Happy Birthday to him when we got our drinks

We had a great time I advised the hotel when booking it was my husband s 40th birthday They got him a card which was signed by all the staff We were also lucky enough to get a room upgrade this made his 40th birthday extra special Thank you to all the staff at the Chesterfield Mayfair

Negative_Review: only downside is our room didn t have a refrigerator Rates are high but we got a good deal
Positive_Review: great room well appointed in a wonderful part of town close to restaurants pubs etc and reasonably close to metro
Loved this hotel ALL staff were warm welcoming and helpful Breakfast included was a great value and delicious Mayfair is an excellent central location as well

Negative_Review: The hotel itself was worn out though the rooms were good Elevators are terrible Staff was a bit discourteous and mismanaged The lobby and restaurant seemed empty
Positive_Review: Amazing location close to the underground and all the great shops and restaurants Rooms though small had plenty of storage and the bed was comfortable Bathrooms were clean and the rain head shower was great

Everything This is a traditional hotel with luxury and good service at its heart The room was plush and comfortable Everything was top quality from the sheets to the toiletries Breakfast was tasty and varied not just the usual full English All staff were attentive and helpful Excellence in the old fashioned style

Friendly staff and very helpful We had a problem with the tv and they gave us the room next door to watch tv in the evening after a long day out in London And also let us keep the original room so didn t have to pack away all our things Tv was fixed first thing the following morning Excellent service
Very comfortable room ideal location for visiting Buckingham Palace also the Theatre was in walking distance at Shaftsbury Avenue wouldn t suit everyone to walk it takes a good 25 mins

Negative_Review: Cannot really fault the place the standard rooms are quite snug but I guess that s fairly normal for London hotels
Positive_Review: Responded really well and efficiently to an issue with my room I had a leak in the bathroom and they instantly upgraded me to a better room

Love this Hotel We have stayed her before and it did not disappoint The staff are brilliant the facilities are all you would want Being in Mayfair is just wonderful The Chesterfield have mastered that perfect level of excellent customer service and looking after their guests without the pretension We will be back again and again
First I love this hotel I would almost go to London just to stay here Great location and staff Chris the concierge is wonderful as is the rest of the staff Good breakfast Small but comfortable rooms

Really fantastic location with lovely surrounding Super close to the Backingham Palace Hyde Park busy but cool Piccadilly street Direct Piccadilly tube line from Heathrow airport what saves a lot of time during busy traffic hours I had a clean cosy room though be ready that rooms in London are small but that hotel has well equipped rooms tea coffee facilities iron super slippers with thick soft soles bath robes and even an EU socket type Comfortable beds Very friendly and guests oriented staff I was given first a room with a poor view on air conditioners block but after addressing this to the reception they upgraded me to a better and absolutely lovely room So I did enjoyed the visit and also thanks to such a comfortable accommodation

Negative_Review: we coud have used a ittle help with lugage to room
Positive_Review: rooms a good size with all that you could wish for to make you comfortable good access to main shopping areas

Negative_Review: For the price one would think breakfast would be included certainly not worth an extra 20 30 per person
Positive_Review: Very nice attention to detail nice welcoming and turn down services

Negative_Review: Sometimes it was too cold in room despite air conditioner showing 25C
Positive_Review: Perfect location excellent perconnel The room has everything you need The hotel is very beautiful
Fantastic stay Very cosy ambiance And thoughtful attention a cupcake with a birthday card for my daughter Delicious breakfast Very good bed We will come back soon

Negative_Review: Hotel was at room limit could we leave earlier We did but at that price maybe a small refund would have been in order
Positive_Review: Friendly staff High class facility and Chesterfield furniture

Negative_Review: A bit disappointed in the maitre d when we were told we didn t need to book for dinner Waited and waited Not sure why as restaurant was hardly full
Positive_Review: Love staying here So convenient

Negative_Review: There was some minor noise from the street below my room even though I was on the fourth floor Some of the decor is getting tired with one picture which had torn the fabric on the walls with its weight was no longer straight and risked falling off in my colleagues room
Positive_Review: On arrival I received an upgraded room to a double from a single which was a great start to the stay The staff were very polite and well organised even when faced with an extremely difficult guest on my first night who spoke terribly to some of the staff members for no fault of their own the bar team James and Antolio were great very friendly and both were good company whilst I had some time in the bar making me feel extremely welcome during my stay Food was excellent and the breakfast was fantastic My room was large and comfortable very quiet and made for a perfect base to go to work from with all of the nice extras provided like slippers and dressing gowns The location was perfect for my meeting on St James Square but it is also ideally located for some high end shopping on bond street and fortnum and masons with plenty of places to eat ranging from the restaurants on Curzon Street to Chinatown which is only 15 minutes walk I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the hotel and will be staying there again for any further trips i have within the area

Negative_Review: Rooms could be slightly larger the bed fills most of the space
Positive_Review: Very kind and obliging staff bathroom clean and relatively spacious rooms elegantly furnished
Best London hotel with the most attentive personable staff Really enjoyed our stay can t wait to come back Comfortable rooms and great bedding slept like a baby

Negative_Review: Trying to find fault here is a difficult task I ll give it a shot the shampoo bottles were slightly difficult to squeeze whilst wet There
Positive_Review: This hotel is the way all hotels should be Attentive polite and friendly service Comfortable bed and linens The decor is all English classic warmth The walls are lined with high quality batted cloth The lounge has a good selection of whiskeys and friendly servers The details have all been thought out Everything you could need is in your room Scissors scotch tape and stationary Check Sewing kit and shoe shine kit Of course Just detail after detail every one of them correct The place is pricey but if you can afford it it s one of the best and more intimate than a larger establishment like the Ritz Loved it

Great location in nice neighborhood friendly and switched on staff and the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in And I ve logged a few hotel nights over the years I always try and get a room here it s really a lovely place And quiet
Excellent location staff wonderful Breakfast great Room 508 a bit tired and brown with shower over the bath Awkward to get in and out Would return edpecially if refurbished

Negative_Review: A small complimentary bottle of wine in the room on first night otherwise stay was great
Positive_Review: Good breakfast great location good staff comfortable Next time in London will stay here

Negative_Review: The air conditioning in the restaurant made it a bit too cold for my liking
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely friendly and helpful and made our stay really enjoyable

Negative_Review: the stay was perfect except the towels they had a weird smell they are clean but the smell was annoying
Positive_Review: The staff is friendly The rooms are very clean the welcoming message is nice and it gives you suggestions on where to go and what to see in London
Staff excellent position wonderful convenient totally silent at night which was a surprise Fabulous breakfast buffet and menu
This hotel is in a fantastic location just off Berkeley square and close walking distance to restaurants such as Sexy Fish and Scott s The breakfast was extremely good and the staff very helpful

The service was excellent and by far the best we have ever encountered in London if not anywhere we have stayed A group of us travelled to the hotel for my brother s 50th birthday and they could not have done more to make our stay and his birthday incredibly special I would highly recommend this hotel and can t wait to return

Negative_Review: Nothing comes to mind rooms a little tight
Positive_Review: Found the whole experience most enjoyable Cost is high but you don t mind when everything is exceptional
We upgraded to the Jungle Suite were rewarded with champagne while our luggage was moved Then canap s arrived every evening plus many other extra touches made our stay fabulous

Negative_Review: There was a leak in the bathroombasinwhich we reported but was not addressed during our stay
Positive_Review: Beds were very comfortable the staff were helpful A great ambience

Negative_Review: Perhaps the room could have been a little larger or maybe remove one of the chairs
Positive_Review: Love this hotel the staff the cleanliness the location Perfect for us when visiting London

Excellent quiet hotel well located The gin tasting in the bar is a worthwhile evening experience The staff went out of their way to accommodate us e g set up early coffee and croissants for a 4 AM departure

The staff was extremely kind from the moment we arrived st 8am until we left after 7 nights Chris the Concierge was excellent and the most helpful Concierge I cannot praise him enough He is a gem I highly recommend The Chesterfield Mayfair Our first visit to London was a great experience due to the staff

Negative_Review: The table surface in our bedroom was rather dusty The cooked breakfast was OK but nothing special especially the toast tough and the coffee lukewarm
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful nothing was too much trouble The room was comfortable and well appointed The central location was just what we needed

Negative_Review: Could be better with a gym
Positive_Review: Very high standard staff and central located in one of the most upscale locations of London The hotel is indeed a 5 stars in it s quality

Negative_Review: Maids make too much noise outside the door early in the morning with such thin walls There was construction outside our window we were told they don t make noise Not only did they make noise but they started at 7am
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful personable The breakfast room and buffet are lovely Beds were extremely comfortable

Negative_Review: Ham sandwiches off the bar menu were poor value for money being a bit meagre with the filling
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed choice of pillows Breakfast lovely if you can get it included otherwise it s 22 Excellent service

Negative_Review: I truly cannot think of a single thing that I didn t like
Positive_Review: The breakfast was excellent such a variety The staff are so attentive with invading ones space and the everywhere is comfortable and spotlessly clean

Negative_Review: We were in a room right on the corner of the building and there was traffic noise all night from taxis rumbling past so sadly not well rested Everything else was fine
Positive_Review: Lovely twin room Clean and comfortable Centrally located Helpful staff on Reception

Negative_Review: have nothing that I would say needs to be imporved
Positive_Review: food was really nice had room service twice and arrived prompt and hot by attentive waiting staff ALL the staff where genuinely polite and helpful

Negative_Review: TVs are terrible for the odd hour or two you would want to spend in front of one The building is quite old so if you re a history buff you would find something to admire not so much for a modernist
Positive_Review: Very very friendly staff especially Gabriel from reception who was very kind Overall a nice hotel but nothing supreme about the location or decor
The location was fantastic The staff were friendly and helpful I enjoyed being welcomed each morning and evening by the doorman It felt like home for the few days we stayed

Efficient check in and check out Great ambience and service in the lobby bar While sitting at the bar I had a stake from the restaurant which was very good Room is impeccably clean and with comfortable bed At 6am I was pleased to discover a self service table with coffee tee and pastries for the guests with early check out

Negative_Review: A fridge in the room would of been nice
Positive_Review: Staff were fantastic and very friendly and approachable The cleaning and the topping up of tea coffee facilities in the room was brilliant

A most excellent hotel Perfect service from Reception to Porter and Conci rge The hotel itself is very charming indeed but most importantly every member of staff went out of their way to help us Highly recommend this hotel

Negative_Review: Only stayed 1 night wish it could have been longer
Positive_Review: The staff really make this hotel what it is simply the best There s nothing about this hotel not to like The food the drinks the service the comfortable beds the location it s all fantastic Thank you once again for a truly memorable stay

Negative_Review: As Americans we re used to a lot of space unnecessary space so we felt as though the room was a little tight even with the upgrade Not their fault as we did quite a bit of country hopping throughout Europe and other rooms were comparably sized it s just a cultural difference and shouldn t be held against the hotel just be aware Plus the room was immaculate
Positive_Review: Great location Close to the tube close to lots of shopping nightlife and tourist attractions On a side street so the hustle and bustle isn t right at the front door but just two blocks away Staff was extremely courteous accomodating and gave great directions Also we received a free room upgrade on arrival

Negative_Review: Bar drinks were okay not great Staff slightly distracted though extremely friendly once asked
Positive_Review: Great location quiet convenient to everything large room great bath great wifi Amazing price

The rooms although small are very comfortable with excellent bedding The staff is extremely nice and friendly Turn down and cleaning each day is wonderful Afternoon tea is a plus as well as a night cap in the bar
Lovely hotel in heart of quiet Mayfair Reception staff were wonderful The room upgrade card and cake for my wife s birthday were great and made our stay even more special

Negative_Review: Nothing that we experienced was unlikeable
Positive_Review: Staff exceptionally attentive but without being overbearing Room clean and comfortable Sadly we didn t get to sample any of their food as we explored the rest of London however superbly located for getting around Would recommend a stay and certainly would return without question

Negative_Review: Extras can be a little pricey so just be careful but the quality is good
Positive_Review: The location is great central but quite the hotel is charming and the staff friendly the rooms are clean and well presented and comfortable not huge but well appointed
Loved everything about this hotel The service The fluffy towels and robes The personnel is excellent especially Chris from concierge The food was delicious The atmosphere Butlers restaurant Tea Time

The Staff were extremely friendly and very helpful All our requirements were fully met We only spent two nights but we were very impressed with the hotel It is in a great location and easily accessible

Negative_Review: The rationed breakfast I asked for two cumberland sausage but was only allocated one The cost of drinks in the bar 40 for three drinks Normal for hotels in London I know but you could start a revolution by being reasonable
Positive_Review: The overall feel of the hotel Great staff great location lovely breakfast very comfortable room

The staff were extremely helpful and welcoming Food was beautifully prepared The room was clean and regularly tidied The hotel was ideally located for a stay in London and within easy distance of all the main attractions

Negative_Review: The bar lounge area felt very dark
Positive_Review: This hotel has the quaint British feel while also delivering luxury cleanliness and quiet I enjoyed the refurbished room on the 6th floor and the nice tea service handily available in the room The bed was comfortable and I liked the hotel slippers

Negative_Review: I would have liked a walk in shower as not able to climb in the bath couldn t get the tv to work but perhaps this is not for technophobes
Positive_Review: superb quality and not a touch of minimalism in sight a step back in time but with all the mod cons lovely comfy bed and fabulous eggs benedict
Staff were helpful and friendly Lovely spacious dining area for breakfast the tables were placed to ensure privacy for diners Very clean and a welcoming atmosphere

Negative_Review: My second visit to this hotel and I have got both times a shower that dripped all the time
Positive_Review: Service and the interieur reminds you of Downton Abbey nice to be treated like that

Negative_Review: Room was a tad small and didn t have a iPod dock
Positive_Review: Staff ultra friendly and attentive mood lighting in bathroom was great making for very relaxing bath room was refreshed completely and bed turned down whilst we were out for dinner even had pillow mist sprays

Negative_Review: New staff in training not as helpful They lacked the welcoming spirit of the more seasoned staff The breakfast spread was a little simple Breakfasts in all the Red Carnation hotels could be improved upon
Positive_Review: The location room cleanliness and comfort Lovely decor Concierge was very helpful

Negative_Review: the rooms are very small rather expensive but i guess still value for the money
Positive_Review: the staff was very helpful and professional beautiful building and common areas great location

Negative_Review: I can t think of anything to improve our stay
Positive_Review: All the staff were super attentitive My wife was given a special birthday cup cake Breakfast was cooked to order and wonderful The G T in the bar was perfect with a really nice ambience Our room was lovely and spacious

Negative_Review: Somewhere to put the used tea bags We had to use bits of paper and sandwich wrappers to stop the old tea bags marking the spotless rubbish bins A plastic bag would have been good Just a minor thing but still an irritant
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy and the overall service was very good

Negative_Review: We reserved a Classic room and the only issue was the size of the bathroom Very small so two people in there at the same time was difficult This on its own would not prevent us staying again as everything else was so good
Positive_Review: Excellent Service and Facilities

Negative_Review: Not much The bathroom tiling and plumbing could do with an update and was a bit small but pressure and temperature were excellent which is much more important
Positive_Review: Staff genuine friendly and attentive Room well decorated with thoughtful touches throuought Instructions and information in room excellent and clearly written Breakfast was so so good
Best hotel I have stayed in for years Excellent room wonderful staff every detail perfect for a great price The style is boutique traditional with great style and finishing touches

Negative_Review: 1st floor Classic Room should only be used for B ness person on own Definitely NOT for a couple the bathroom the bed very small Shower in bath sprays all over floor due to bad design of tiny bathroom Building works right outside the bedroom window breakfast room
Positive_Review: Great Staff Location

Loved the quiet location and the coziness of the hotel The bed was very comfortable and the linens nice There was great lighting especially in the bathroom which often is not the case As a female traveling alone I felt very safe And the neighborhood has good coffee shops take out places a juice bar and mini mart within a block Would definitely go back

Negative_Review: Bedroom was small the king sized beds are out of proportion with the rest of the room making it difficult for 2 people to move around at the same time Furniture and fittings somewhat dated
Positive_Review: Friendly and efficient staff in all Departments Excellent breakfast in relaxing setting Hotel well situated for easy access to all Central London activities

Negative_Review: The rooms are small compared to other Mayfair hotels The check in was at first handled by an ineffective sarcastic receptionist who passed on the buck to an intern I guess someone has to bite the bullet everyone and then hence a long delay It was very difficult for a couple to move around in the same room
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Our room 406 was comfortable but looking a little tired and the outlook to the back was not good
Positive_Review: The location of the Hotel is great for shopping or looking at the sights Very quiet area but convenient

Negative_Review: Area is central but quiet Hotel is old and you can tell Very old fashioned
Positive_Review: Location staff was polite Room are Well equipped small boutique hotel
Wonderful staff polite and very helpful Very good breakfast and included in the room rate Single room was small but very comfortable Excellent Mayfair location

Negative_Review: Tiny tiny room Steps in the room No overhead shower tub only hand held Very high step to get into the shower Old hotel it is London I have a very sensitive nose and could smell mold For most people this would not be noticeable The manager tried to upgrade us but the cost was absurd Even for london If I was going to be paying that much more I d have booked the Ritz
Positive_Review: Staff friendly fabulous location nice breakfast

Negative_Review: Felt so at home can t fault a thing
Positive_Review: Stayed in a newly refurbished room lovely quality decor Bed very comfortable nice touches in room to provide all you need ie bathrobe slippers bottled water good selection for hot drinks in the room too and the list carries on

Negative_Review: The room overlooked a large bank of air conditioning heating units and was noisy enough to prevent me opening a window at night not good I wasn t asked at reception whether I had enjoyed my stay or would have pointed this out to them
Positive_Review: The overall quality of staff attention especially in the dining room and from the concierge service

Negative_Review: there was no mini bar in the room
Positive_Review: very professional and helpful staff they can give solutions to any matter problem with no delay free wifi free coffee and tea in the room

Negative_Review: Even if I were smaller the Classic Double was very small and the bathroom and facilities even smaller The hot cold shower was never balanced and there was the inevitable building work outside For this price I would expect more space It was also an insult to be told I could get a bigger room for more money
Positive_Review: THIS IS A CLASSY HOTEL Although all things are expensive once you cross the doorway things are done with style The Breakfast was superb and the Service even better

The best hotel we have ever stayed at in central London The staff are wonderful The position is perfect with most attractions within easy walking distance The room we were upgraded to a Junior suite was beautifully attired Very Quiet very comfortable Breakfast was a little expensive but superb service from ever smiling staff as much as you wanted to eat When in London we will stay at the Chesterfield A big thank you for everyone who made our stay so enjoyable

Negative_Review: Typically for central London the room was a little compact but still very comfortable
Positive_Review: Staff were very welcoming and the overall feel of this hotel was very pleasant The location could not be better We had a thoroughly enjoyable stay and would certainly book again
Everything Perfect for a solo traveller staff was helpful and friendly room was small but user friendly the bed was comfortable and the location was good

We ve stayed here for years rooms are smallish but well decorated comfortable and quiet Far more personality and welcoming than most London hotels in which we ve stayed Staff and concierge always go above and beyond the call of duty

It is located in the middle of Mayfair which is a nice and quiet place The staff were very friendly and helpful and always welcoming They responded very fast to our requests and I cannot say more about the cleanness of the room and the toilet Every night they left a nice little gift on the bed

Negative_Review: None to report maybe extra milks in room
Positive_Review: Great staff accommodated my request and also as I forgot my cufflinks they managed to get a member of staff to pass me his above and beyond customer service
All the staff were great and very welcoming The design of the interior looked abit quirky in the online photos then we arrived and saw for ourselves and we loved it
The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable The location in Mayfair is excellent This is one of my favorite hotels for all my travels but especially while staying in London

Negative_Review: I had booked a queen size single room as I was travelling alone but found it much smaller than I thought it would be The space between two pieces of furniture was SO tight in parts of the room I kept banging my thigh on the corner of the unit as I tried to get in and out Next time I ll book a double room in the hopes there ll be more space
Positive_Review: All the staff were extremely helpful friendly lovely without exception a pleasure to deal with The hotel s location was great for where I needed to be for my meetings my subsequent shopping expedition A lovely little hidden gem in the midst of Mayfair

Negative_Review: There was nothing not to like good location central of Mayfair and 5 minutes from Hyde Park
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly helpful and couldn t do enough to help us The room was spotless and clean and the facilities were everything you needed

Negative_Review: reservation was lost and while it was honored the staff were less than discrete in the way it was handled
Positive_Review: Location and conducive to a good night s sleep

Negative_Review: Walk around 10minutes to the tube station Not so close and not so far as well As they do room service it seems that everything is spotless except the tea pot A brown tea strip can be seen inside
Positive_Review: Friendly and supportive staff good location in city centre super comfortable bed because my back hurts usually I m sensitive to the bed complimentary high speed wifi and coffee tea bar

Negative_Review: Rather small and under equipped bathrooms
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff comfortable beds in decent sized rooms Extremely well located for shopaholics and foodies right in the middle of dynamic Mayfair

Negative_Review: Considerable noise on the first night of our stay due to the close proximity of a wedding reception being held in the hotel that night
Positive_Review: The public areas were of a particularly high standard and the staff therein very attentive

The room was excellent brilliant location everywhere we wanted to go was within 20 30 minute walk Breakfast was perfect wide selection and good buffet Staff were very friendly and made us feel very welcome

Negative_Review: Some aspects of the room were looking a little tired and the shower door did not close well without some effort Check in and out took time as the reception was busy and there were not enough staff and terminals available to manage the number of guests and not a peak time
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly and helpful at all times
We absolutely loved our stay at the Chesterfield The bed was very comfortable as was the pillows The staff especially Chris was extremely helpful We would definitely stay here if in London again
Excellent location and breakfast Unanimously the staff were very helpful in such circumstances you feel happy to give a tip great location for Mayfair and Hyde Park

Negative_Review: It took 2 hours to check us in which was a bit annoying and our room was a bit on the small size
Positive_Review: We stayed for our anniversary and we had a wonderful time we were well looked after by all the staff and breakfast was delicious

Negative_Review: we were staying in a king room on the 5th floor The room itself was spacious and nice but there were problems with the water pressure and it was impossible to adjust the water to the right temperature We were told that all the rooms in the 5th floor suffer the same problem
Positive_Review: No Positive

We loved the location Our room was beautifully decorated with a separate shower and bath I liked the underfloor heating in the bathroom We were in The Chesterfirld Suite I highly recommend it It was quiet and extremely comfortable Every evening the hotel sent complimentary canap s up to our room They were delicious The staff we exceptionally friendly professional polite and went out of their way to help us and answer endless questions

Negative_Review: I was surprised the room was not larger especially as I was upgraded
Positive_Review: The In Room Guide was the best explaining how everything in the room worked from the TV to the Air conditioning a much needed requirement in all Hotels There were even Yoga excercises listed plus all the usual what to see how to guides The cleaniness the overal way the Hotel looked cared about No chips scuffs stains

We liked everything The hotel is simply a boutique the staff were all polite and helpfull The room was clean and been serviced daily Wifi was completely free Breakfast was simply great I so much want to get back

Well I ve never wrote a review before but I thought I m going to break that rule because this hotel was absolutely exceptional From the moment we pulled up to the moment we pulled away the experience was fantastic I booked the weekend as a surprise for my partners birthday and all the requests I made happened but on top of that the hotel staff also added their touch by sending my partner a birthday card cake up to the room which was amazing such a caring touch The room itself was beautiful so peaceful the bed was massive and so comfortable it was the best night sleep But I think the biggest positive about the stay was the staff they were absolutely amazing so polite so helpful they were more like old friends then staff just incredible I can t rave about this hotel enough from someone who don t do reviews take it from me this is the only hotel worth staying at if your busting London and your looking for the extra touch of class
The staff is very pleasant accommodating and efficient The rooms were immaculate and comfortable The location was ideal on a quiet street in Mayfair

Negative_Review: The room was a little small but come on look where you are You don t go to London and stay in your room
Positive_Review: Everything Yes the location is perfect the breakfast is great the feeling of grandeur is nice but The most amazing part of this hotel is the staff I travel a lot with my job and I can tell you the warm welcome and courtesy of the staff is 2nd to none I have experienced before They made us feel very special a big thanks to them for making our visit truly unforgettable If you want to visit London and enjoy a true British experience then look no further
The staff were brilliant and extremely helpful and friendly It was for my sisters birthday and they brought her up a cake and a card it was a lovely touch We will defiantly return

The staff are great They have done whatever they could to make us happy and comfortable The location is good The chek in and out process was very quick Very flexible as they are extend our check out until 8 pm Again the staff are great

Staff very friendly helpful Pleasantly surprised happy to see a handwritten congratulations card with staff signatures beautifully decorated icing cupcake placed on the table upon entering our room after attending my daughter s graduation ceremony held at The Royal Festival Hall Very thoughtful staff with impeccable service we wish to convey our heartfelt thanks to all of them

The service was excellent Very attentive Loved the doorman Michael Met your every need Great lounge with piano player Wifi worked well Cleaning staff excellent Great location in safe quaint neighborhood away from all of the craziness of the area around The London Eye Excellent restaurants and shopping just a walk away

Not our first or last visit All of the staff are helpful and welcoming most especially Letitia on reception Paul and Biagio in the restaurant Extremely pet friendly our cairn terrier was welcomed after every walk and a drink provided pronto Absolute excellence 10 10

Negative_Review: Our only slight disappointment with our stay is that we are not used to cleaning staff picking up our personal belongings and putting them away think toothbrush which was drying in its case on the counter taken out of its case and put in glass travel pillow moved etc Perhaps this would not bother other travelers but we did not like it We asked to have no service to the room but housekeeping told us that was not an option So if something like this would bother you be sure to put your belongings away before leaving the room
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and helpful the hotel was very clean well appointed and comfortable If you choose the breakfast included option you may choose from all of the breakfast options something we did not find out until our 3rd day The location of the hotel is very quiet and safe

Absolutely LOVED my stay here at the chesterfield The staff were incredibly helpful welcoming and warm The location was absolutely perfect literally right next to Hyde park and only a short walk into the main town for heaps of shopping
